backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality; backend is unused for this client-side application.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: romantic landing page, interactive Yes/No buttons with hover behavior, romantic emoji display on Yes click, and responsive mobile design.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the romantic proposal app structure, interactive button behavior, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining design tokens for backgrounds, foregrounds, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title, root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing proposal state, displaying question with floating hearts, rendering ProposalButtons, and showing celebration image with footer when Yes is clicked.
Interactive button component with stationary Yes button and No button that randomly repositions on hover/touch to prevent clicking, handling both desktop and mobile events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook for managing ICP backend actor instances with authentication, creating anonymous or authenticated actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file as no backend queries are needed for this client-side romantic proposal page.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with romantic pink/white OKLCH color scheme, gradient background, custom romantic color utilities, fade-in/scale-in animations, and mobile-friendly touch handling with text selection prevention.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes (using oklch), typography, container queries, animations, border radius, shadows, and font families for a romantic-themed UI with sidebar and chart components.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting a romantic proposal web page for Nibtahil with interactive Yes/No buttons, pink/white theme, mobile responsiveness, and features for displaying a romantic image on Yes click.
